page.title: 19A COOKSMILL GREEN RESIDENT
page.content: I have lived in Cooksmill Green nearly all my life and I've had enough of it. Things have changed so much and not really for the better.We used to have a{shop}but now it's a house.The pub is a house so is the old school at Radley Green.Anyone{without a car}has to rely on neighbours for shopping.The nearest shop is 3 miles away.The{bus service is a joke.Once I could see my children to school,get the bus to Chelmsford, and be back for tea.Now the 1st bus passes the bottom of the lane too late to get anyone to work,too early for mothers.The evening bus into town does not return.The Council used to{cut the {verges}before the cow parsley seeded, now that's up to the farmers.{Milk}is only{delivered}every other day A{copse {seems to disappear}overnight.{Fields have become like{prairies. The{real country people}have{gone. }
